json_to_edit.voice_over: I never imagined I'd come face to face with my own creation... and my own destruction.
json_to_edit.description: Alex confronts Dr. Frankenstein about the Doppelgänger that's taken over his life.
json_to_edit.name: Confrontation with Creator
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Alex confronts Dr. Frankenstein about the Doppelgänger stealing his life.

qa.action: An old, dilapidated mansion on a stormy night, lightning illuminating its eerie silhouette.

hf.action: Alex cautiously enters the vast, cluttered laboratory filled with strange equipment.

tr.action: Dr. Frankenstein turns from his work, surprised to see Alex.

xc.action: Alex's eyes widen in shock as he sees photos of himself on Dr. Frankenstein's desk.

ka.action: From Alex's perspective, we see detailed plans for creating a perfect copy of him.

fn.action: Alex confronts Dr. Frankenstein, demanding answers about the Doppelgänger.

af.action: Dr. Frankenstein's face contorts into a mix of pride and madness as he explains his creation.

qo.action: Alex, in a fit of rage, knocks over lab equipment, triggering alarms.

fp.action: Alex flees the laboratory, leaving Dr. Frankenstein calling after him.

edit_command: Add two shots at the end and remove the first shot. Don't change anything else.

yz.action: Camera follows Alex as he runs through the mansion's dark corridors, lightning flashes revealing glimpses of bizarre experiments.

wx.action: Alex's panicked eye as he looks back, seeing a shadowy figure that could be Dr. Frankenstein or his Doppelgänger pursuing him.

label.rationale:
we will update the json according to the edit command. we'll remove the first shot (with key "qa"), and add two new shots at the end. we'll also update the "number_of_shots" to reflect these changes. here's how we'll proceed:

1. remove the first shot (key "qa") from the "shots" dictionary and update the "list_display_order".
2. add two new shots at the end with creative descriptions that fit the scene's context.
3. update the "number_of_shots" from "9" to "10" (9 - 1 + 2 = 10).
4. update the "list_display_order" to reflect these changes.

the new shots will continue the narrative of alex fleeing the laboratory, adding tension and a cliffhanger ending to the scene.
